name: Gardevoir GX
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Secret Spring
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a {Y} Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Infinite Force
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Twilight GX
attacks.effect: Shuffle 10 cards from your discard pile into your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
